title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.9 - Estates and trusts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 263.9 - Estates and trusts

State Regulations

Tax Law, § 8(e) of § 1340(c); Codes and Ordinances of the

City of Yonkers, § 92-105(e)

The City of Yonkers fiduciary earnings tax return for an
estate or trust must be made and filed by the fiduciary. When the fiduciary is
a trustee of two or more trusts, such trustee must make a separate City of

Yonkers fiduciary earnings tax return for each trust, even though such trusts
were created by the same grantor for the same beneficiary or
beneficiaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
263.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
